channel.title: Summoning
channel.description:
Alright i would like to add summoning to my server but where would i find a tut about how to add it.
All i want is the like summoning items with monsters pop up and follow you.
Saw a vid that 1 server had it so you drop the item and a daggonoth comes up and follows you.

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

ideally neither worked they both gave me an error under the s

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

ideally server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(newNPC, absX, absY, heightLevel); would work fine aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

well right, depending on the sources. I think figment, allstar and a couple of others have summonNpc but most do not work right.

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

[quote=“guitars595, post:3, topic:236446”]Well adding the summoning items is client sided but making the monsters pop up when you click the items is client items. You have to go to your item click cases and add in something like this case ####: summonNewNpc(####); sendMessage("You summon a giant monkey."); break; That would be just very simple summoning[/quote]
Of course you would have to add the void of summonNewNpc first.

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Well adding the summoning items is client sided but making the monsters pop up when you click the items is client items. You have to go to your item click cases and add in something like this case ####: summonNewNpc(####); sendMessage("You summon a giant monkey."); break; That would be just very simple summoning

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

First of all adding the items into the client would be a good start, making them work is easy so you might be able to do this yourself.
For making a NPC spawn there should be a tutorial around here use the search bar, if not use google.com you will have a answer from that 100%
Hope I helped.

Read full topic
